activities: Cirrata provides information management services to small and medium sized professional service firms.  Although we do not directly acquire or use any customer information, the nature of our service is to store private customer data on our infrastructure.  Our service includes backup and disaster recovery for PCs and laptops, file and folder sharing capabilities, desktop conferencing and remote desktop access.  Because we are a service company, and in order to provide a high level of service, we maintain access to the network and our storage appliances.  We do not access private customer information, our privacy policy states that, but the fact is that we physically could.  We do not intend to cover human resource information under our certification.   We would like to cover all content that our customer places on our infrastructure and being private.
